message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/LinkeddataServerHowTo 

Several tools are now available for publishing linked data
[1
]. Each tool will requires a different server configuration. In this
HOWTO
we explain how to setup a
Linux based Linked Data server
following the approach taken by
DBpedia
(
Pubby
+
Virtuoso
).
Requirements

Linux based OS.
Sun JRE installed, version 1.5 or up is recommended.
speaker: SYSTEM
